name: Survival Simulator (itch)
description: Hey you, yes you, Are you tired of survival simulators that are oversimplified ,those that do everything for you by pressing single button ?  Me too and thats why i desided to fix that, so i happy to introduce Survival Simulator ,a game about survival on a deserted island. Its kidna generic survival simulator ,but with lots of twistes that makes it unique game ,so if you deside to play my game i hope you will have fun.
